t: Aware: Inside Amazon’s new private label for sustainable goods | Trellis
s: July 24, 2024 - Today, Amazon is launching Aware, a new private-label brand of consumer products it has deemed sustainable, environmentally speaking. It’s a bold new initiative that could, if it succeeds, advance the overall market for greener products. Available for customers in the United States, Canada and Europe, Aware has an initial focus in three categories of “everyday essentials”: apparel; household goods...
